snippet: The body of the 53-year-old man, a familiar neighborhood figure who collected scrap metal, was found on the edge of a park in the Bronx around 3 a.m.
abstract: The body of the 53-year-old man, a familiar neighborhood figure who collected scrap metal, was found on the edge of a park in the Bronx around 3 a.m.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and MATTHEW WOLFE

headline.main: Man Trying to Rescue Cat Dies in Fall From Tree
headline.print_headline: Man Falls to Death Trying to Save Cat
